All delivery locations are nonzero (that is, none are at the post office).

-----Output-----
Output the minimum total travel distance needed to deliver all the letters and return to the post office.

-----Examples-----
Sample Input:
3 100
-10 50
10 175
25 20
Sample Output:
90
